text: Mars 2020 is a Mars rover mission by NASA's Mars Exploration Program including the Perseverance rover and the Ingenuity helicopter drone. It was launched on 30 July 2020 at 11:50 UTC, and landed in the Jezero crater on Mars on 18 February 2021. It investigated to see if living organisms lived on Mars and if people can live there. The Ingenuity helicopter crashed in January 2024. ==References== Category:Mars Category:NASA spacecraft
title: Mars 2020
